Name: Yacochuya
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Château Giscours (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Montefico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Quartet
Wine Description: The nose offers aromas of ripe strawberries and raspberries freshly picked in the heat of afternoon sun, with nuances of flint and cherry cola. On the palate, the Arietta Quartet suggests red plum, blackberry cordial, cocoa, black liquorice, supported by persistent, silky tannins from the already well-integrated French oak.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Every vintage of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is crafted with a focus on striking a perfect balance between beautiful fruit, silky tannins and a lingering finish. It is this delicate balance—all done by taste—that allows for the gradual, graceful evolution of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon in bottle.

Name: Barolo Marcenasco
Wine Description: Garnet red color. A bouquet with traces of licorice and tobacco. Full flavored, full-bodied and elegant.

Name: L'Oratoire des Papes Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine focuses its efforts on muscle, flesh, power and resilience. The nose is forward with a beautiful mélange of cassis, dark chocolate, espresso and dried herbs. Perfectly framed tannins integrate with a plush, persistent palate making this a complex wine that expertly showcases our Calistoga terroir. With power, yet restrain, this wine can be enjoyed now or cellared beyond 2030

Name: Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Emilien
Wine Description: This wine has red colour of black cherries. Powerful nose of freshly smashed red berries. Intense and rich in the mouth, harmonious final. Well-balanced and supple.

Name: Figaro Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Wester Reach Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Zinfandel Mayacamas Range
Wine Description: It's young and it's deep; it's nicely focused on bright blackberry fruit and it's tight but promising... and given the remarkable Storybook Mountain track record with its Zins, we have nothing but full confidence in this one's ability to reach great heights

Name: Costasera Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Deep ruby ​​red. Stewed fruit, plum and cherry to the nose. Fruity aromas with notes of coffee and cocoa. Extremely balanced.

Name: Pirouette
Wine Description: Philippe Melka and Agustin Huneeus, Sr. teamed to create this Cab-based Bordeaux blend. The wine is unfiltered and unfined to allow for a generous spectrum of aromas and flavors, including black cherry, sweet spices and a hint of earth.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of fresh raspberries, red currant, vanilla bean, and spice. This wine's rich color is complemented by layers of bright red and dark berries, ripe black cherries, and lush tannins with a structured core that allows for graceful aging.

Name: Sequel Syrah
Wine Description: John Duval, from Australia’s iconic Penfolds Grange, chose the Columbia Valley as the “Sequel” to his life’s work with Syrah. Rich aromatics and layers of almond and dark chocolate are complemented by hints of anise, blackberry, and a touch of smoke.

Name: La Source Seven Springs Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tenuta Tignanello 'Marchese Antinori' Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This is a full-bodied, heavyweight Cabernet Sauvignon from the loamy benchland soils of our estate vineyard. The wine is layered with blackberry, black raspberry, caramel and milk chocolate, and sports a great structure and backbone. Focused acid, silky soft tannins, and a touch of spice emerge from the mid-palate. Compelling and complex, this is a fine Bordeaux-style Cabernet blend that will age for decades.

Name: Gigondas Rouge
Wine Description: Eye: Bright cherry red robe. Nose: Spicy notes dominate together with hints of red fruit: the nose is complex and harmonious Mouth: rich and powerful with intense red fruit aromas and a long spicy finish.

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The nose opens with anise and spice before moving into rich layers of blackberry and cherry compote. All that great concentrated fruit is beautifully complemented with barrel tones of vanilla and clove. It is quite youthful and lively on the palate with a good firm acid core and an abundant velvety tannin.

Name: Vinculum Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Fat Cat Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Villa Barbi Umbria Rosso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Julien
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chester Kidder
Wine Description: Long Shadows’ Director of Winemaking & Viticulture, Gilles Nicault, crafted this Cabernet-Syrah blend. Aromas of dried figs and cocoa powder are followed by hints of tamarind, toasty oak and blueberry jam flavors beautifully integrated around a spicy core.

Name: Nicolás Catena Zapata
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine opens up with luxurious layers of blackberry and raspberry jam.Underscored by rich tannins. Beneath the bright expression of fruit lies sophisticated notes of fresh loamy soil, black tea,dried cherries and the sweetness of fresh herbs.

Name: Meredith Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Classically proportioned, pure, firm, rich and juicy, with aromas of violet and wilted rose amid vivid blueberry, wild berry, raspberry, cedar and crushed rock notes. This is both firm and dense, gaining depth and persistence, with a long, tapered finish

Name: Mineral Springs Ranch Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine offers an impressive combination of power and purity. Its ruby-red hue previews a nose of wild strawberry and cranberry while the palate shows bing cherry, red plum, clove and sandalwood with an undercurrent of black fruits reminiscent of marionberry and crushed blackberry. Layer upon layer of depth and complexity are revealed in a velvety texture and lingering finish.

Name: Sito Moresco Langhe
Wine Description: Pure nose with aromas of small fruits. Very elegant and balanced body. The finish is fresh, with fine tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It is round and plush with black currant, caramel and sweet chocolate on the complex palate. The tannins are fuller this year, providing a wonderful backbone to the wine which is complemented by the mountain acidity. The black currant continues on the long finish.

Name: Quinta da Leda Douro
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Moulis-en-Médoc
Wine Description: Lovely bright fruit, with a crystalline black summer berry character. The palate has good freshness, with a crisp style, and crunchy black fruits. There is even a little suppleness to it. Firm, tannic backbone too, with good acidity.

Name: Isosceles
Wine Description: Bright with a dark ruby, purple core lightening slightly at the rim. Aromatic with ripe black cherry, cassis, toasted vanilla, liquorice, cinnamon spice combined with cedar and subtle smoky cocoa notes.

Name: Volnay
Wine Description: N/A

Name: CrossBarn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of cassis and sweet tobacco. The palate is silky and full-bodied, opening with pure, concentrated flavors of dark cherry and black currant. Ripe tannins and notes of cedar and vanillin weave their way in over a long finish.

Name: Grand Durif
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Domaine de Bila-Haut Occultum Lapidem
Region: Côtes du Roussillon Villages 'Latour de France'
Wine Description: Colour : great dark garnet-red. Nose : the first nose is quite closed with a dominant of graphitic, leather, and then intense aromas of pepper, black fruits and scrubs. Mouth : the attack is rich, dense. Then the wine is fleshy and solar. The final is sappy served by delicate tannins and a great freshness

Name: Counterpoint Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Forest
Wine Description: The wine is characterized by a deep purple color, rich fragrance and taste that combines strength with elegance and freshness.

Name: San Stunet S. Stefanetto Barbaresco
Wine Description: Brilliant garnet-red colour with a that is intense and , spices and fruit. The mouth is really full and well balanced with strong body.

Name: Voyage 11
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has bouquet of blueberries, blackberry, and hints of savory herbal aromas, like black olives and pencil lead. It has flavors of cherries and anise, with a plush chalky texture.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Jefferson Cuvée
Wine Description: It has a deep, inky color from the hallmark extraction of the 2013 Vintage. The aromas offer dark red and black berry fruits, wonderfully intertwined with mocha, chocolate and lightly toasted oak.

Name: Lot C-91
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Serradenari Barolo
Wine Description: Intense of Deep ruby red in color, the nose is balanced and feminine, with violet and red fruit characteristics, hints of licorice and sweet spices.

Name: Vinupetra
Wine Description: Ruby red with purple hues. Intense and opulent on the nose, with black cherries, blueberries and currants also jam, followed by mineral tones and shades of stone and wet earth. Fruity on the palate, with well integrated tannins but still in good shape. Great length.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: The result of the Allegrini family’s expertise, a true classic of the appellation, this red wine embraces tradition, territory and the know-how of country ways. Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella and Oseleta are left to air dry at least until December and are checked daily to ensure perfectly healthy grapes.

Name: Tinto
Wine Description: Smooth and deep ruby in color, Pago de Carraovejas Tinto is a robust red wine from the wine region of Ribera del Duero, Spain, which is located at the southern tip of the province of Burgos. It’s renowned for its cherry, blackberry and vanilla notes, alongside low acidity and low tannins. Perfect for wine connoisseurs and novices alike, it’s the perfect bottle to share alongside friends over a delicious dinner. As for pairings, this wine is an excellent choice to enjoy alongside meaty dishes that involve beef, lamb and game, so it’s perfect for sipping alongside a succulent steak dinner on date night. Made from the Tempranillo grape, this wine is rated highly across all of its vintages, however its 2018 vintage featured in the Top 25 Spanish Ribera del Duero red wines in the United States right now, so that might be a bottle you want to get your hands on. Additionally, its 2016 vintage rates better than any other year, so it’s fair to say this wine is an all round good choice, regardless of the vintage you choose. Read on for more reviews and pricing on Pago de Carraovejas Tinto at Vivino.

Name: Pessac-Léognan (Grand Cru Classé de Graves)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Roda Reserva Rioja
Wine Description: Deep colour of good intensity, with a deep red colour background and lively red edging. Good intensity and very expressive. Red ripen fruit character, with some black fruit notes. The wood is perfectly integrated, fine spices notes and a mineral character. Subtle floral nuances in the background. Medium volume, with a fine a silky tannin.

Name: Margaux (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This rich and complex Cabernet shows aromas of black cherry, vanilla and mocha with hints of plum and cassis. Similar flavors carry though on the concentrated palate that is framed by balanced acid and ample plush tannins that lead to a long lingering finish.

Name: Russian River Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: From a vineyard planted two decades ago, Donum presents a wine that is another faithful expression of the land, characterized by elegance, finesse and complexity.

Name: Quarantadue 42 Barbaresco
Wine Description: It is a complex, dry and ethereal wine with an intense garnet colour. The nose has fragrant notes of roses and violets together with sweet spices and a touch of cocoa. In the mouth, it is harmonious and soft yet gifted with firm and noble tannins and a good long finish.

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright red fruit, Rector Creek’s darker red fruit elements, and Patzimaro’s sophisticated mineral, earth and olive character, the final blend displays nuance and varietal integrity. On the palate, subtle notes of herb, spice, toffee and mocha mingle with layers of cassis, currant and black raspberry to add complexity and elegance.

Name: Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: Surprising aromas of fruit and spices. Lots of body and brilliance thanks to the Merlot from the old vines picked at their optimal ripeness. Full-bodied and flavoursome.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Kith & Kin Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Fixin Les Crais
Wine Description: The Fixin Les Crais still retains the elegance and finesse of the HCDB and Fixin Villages, but brings another level of tension, depth and a bit more structure to match its slightly deeper yet more compact core of wound up cherry fruit. Again, fine-boned and detailed, this could use six months to a year to relax and catch up with the other wines, and will be even better in a year or two if you have the patience. Drink 2017 - 2022 .

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ripe fruit gives way to complex aromas of baked dark berry pie. Hints of vanilla, spice and smoke fill the glass. Cassis, black cherry and tobacco offers mild tannins with notes of chocolate and coconut husk with a very long, lingering finish.

Name: Firebelle
Wine Description: It is Very deep ruby red color. Wonderful aromatic intensity – floral violets, black cherry, blackcurrant, sweet thyme & cedar then complex secondary notes of soy and game. Lively exuberant palate entry then immediate density of blackberry and cassis fruit. Bold, rich and youthfully assertive but retains inner-mouth perfume and energetic brightness. Lingering chewy tannins on a flavor-packed finish.

Name: Nuthouse Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Light and tight, packing spicy cranberry, red currant and floral flavors into a lively package. The flavors dance delicately through fine tannins on the long finish.

Name: Bin 389 Cabernet - Shiraz
Wine Description: Bright, deep-red, with an impenetrable core. Fresh mulberry/blueberry/ blackberry fruits laced with soy & malt, and slices of fresh fig & dates. A sweet middle meshed with tea-leaf/olive tapenade flavours. Rounded, ripe and lush tannins and integrated spicy oak usher in the finish.

Name: Ferrington Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Albesani Vigna Borgese Barbaresco
Wine Description: A nose that is harmonious and balanced that reveals fruity aromas with delicate spices and flower undertones. On the palate this wine is full-bodied and elegant with round,tannins.

Name: Pegaso Barrancos de Pizarra
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Gevrey-Chambertin
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mavrotragano
Wine Description: intense red colour with bright hues. Red forest fruit aromas, bitter chocolate, tobacco and minerality. A mascular palate with a tannic character and long aftertaste. Served at 16-18 ° c with red spicy meats, casseroles, as well as mature full fat cheese. Potential aging in the bottle for at least 10 years

Name: La Croix Boissée Chinon Rouge
Wine Description: Vivid ruby. Black cherry, violet, cocoa powder and a whiff of iodine on the nose. Concentrated and tactile, showing noteworthy depth, good definition and elegant lift to the rich cassis flavor. Finishes with noble, fin -grained tannins and astonishing balance, length and elegance.

Name: Signature Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Dark garnet ripe mint, berry, wood nose good mid to high viscosity rich, and long finish.

Name: Volnay
Wine Description: A wine of great elegance with a vivid and bright colour. When the wine is young, the aromas are reminiscent of violet and black currant. With age, the aromas take on notes of ripe or candied fruit, mushroom and mild spices.

Name: Gevrey-Chambertin
Wine Description: brilliant dark ruby colour. The expressive and complex nose has aromas of red fruits with woody notes. We find these same aromas on the palate which are well enveloped by delicately blended tannins.

Name: Saint-Estèphe (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bourgogne 'Les Perrières' Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Dense dark red. Mint/dry herb (rosemary/sage) varietal reminiscences. Wafts of Chorizo (red) sausage; tomato and red capsicum pizza base/bruschetta. Integrated, perfumed oak (polished teak, brown boot-polish).

Name: Mercurey 1er Cru 'Champs Martin' Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: This wine presents an attractive intense carmine red dress to dark purple reflections. Very attractive nose of strawberries gariguettes zabaglione, associated with vanilla of Madagascar marks. The mouth presents a beautiful freshness, on elegant aromas of small red berries (blueberry, raspberry), all this associated with juniper spices, wild cade and rosemary.
